attributes.action: Ensure that all public sector bodies use 03 phone numbers in place of 0845 numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many telephone subscribers now have inclusive minutes or free local call packages.  0845 numbers are not included in them, 03 numbers are. 

03 numbers were introduced by Ofcom as an alternative number for organisations, including public sector bodies, who wish to offer their consumers a single, trusted point of contact.

Calls to 03 numbers cost the same or less than calls to 01 and 02 prefixed numbers and will be included as part of any inclusive minutes or discount package. 

The Government should issue a directive to public sector bodies to use 03 numbers as Ofcom intended them to.
